name: mhoye (@mhoye@mastodon.social)
summary:
"In ancient Greece, as the Achaeans and Trojan armies gather for battle, Paris offers to avert the war and duel Menelaus alone for the hand of Helen, the most beautiful woman in the world. They battle, and though Paris is defeated the goddess Aphrodite rescues him, guiding him to sleep with Helen before Menelaus can find him and finish him off." - An epic (classical literature)

You, in a cubicle, do some basic algebra on server logs to decide what colour a button should be. - An epic (Jira)
